benchmark_details.name: TalkPlayData 2
benchmark_details.overview: TalkPlayData 2 is a synthetic dataset for multimodal conversational music recommendation generated by an agentic data pipeline. It includes various listener types, music queries, conversation goals, and multimodal aspects of music such as audio and images.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To generate realistic conversation data for music recommendation research that covers various conversation scenarios and involves multimodal aspects of music.

data.source: LFM-2b dataset (music listening history data of over 120,000 users)
data.annotation: Generated through a multi-LLM conversation framework with various roles (Listener LLM, Recsys LLM, etc.) for creating realistic dialogue.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on LLM evaluations related to conversation quality and user satisfaction.
methodology.interpretation: Scores reflect the effectiveness of conversational recommendations and the quality of generated text.
methodology.validation: Chronological data split to reflect real-world recommendation scenarios.

targeted_risks.demographic_analysis: Includes balanced sampling across demographic attributes (country, gender, and age).
